exception.name: ErrorClientNotRegistered
exception.description: This exception is thrown if an SE API function is invoked with a clientId, that has not been registered using registerClient beforehand. The clientId is therefore not registered.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorClientNotRegistered that is thrown if an SE API function is invoked with a clientId, that has not been registered using registerClient beforehand. The clientId is therefore not registered.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when invoking transaction functions with an unregistered clientId
